com.gwt.ss.client.GwtSecurityException

Packages that use GwtSecurityException
com.gwt.ss.client   
 

Uses of GwtSecurityException in com.gwt.ss.client
 

Subclasses of GwtSecurityException in com.gwt.ss.client
 class GwtAccessDeniedException
          Denote Server side occur AccessDeniedException
表示主機端發生拒絕存取異常
 class GwtAuthenticationException
          Denote Server side occur AuthenticationException
表示主機端發生授權異常
 class GwtBadCredentialsException
          Denote Server side occur BadCredentialsException  when login credential incorrect.
 class GWTSessionAuthenticationException
          Denote Server side occur SessionAuthenticationException
表示主機端發生SessionAuthenticationException
 

Methods in com.gwt.ss.client that throw GwtSecurityException
